useCase.name: Change Robot State
useCase.description: Allows the admin to request and process a change in the robot's state

preconditions.precondition: The admin is logged in and has the necessary permissions

successEndConditions.condition: The robot state change is successfully processed

failureEndConditions.condition: The robot state change fails to be processed

useCase.trigger: Admin requests a change in the robot's state via the Front-End System

mainSequence.step: Admin requests a robot state change
Front-End System processes the state change
Front-End System displays the outcome to Admin
